meanings.definition: A biennial plant with bright green leaves that are used as a herb in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added some parsley to the soup for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The chef sprinkled parsley on top of the dish before serving.
meanings.sent3: The parsley danced in the pot, adding a touch of green to the stew.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like parsley, adding a fresh and light touch to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The parsley leaves glistened in the sunlight, inviting me to taste their freshness.

meanings.definition: The leaves of this plant, used as a garnish or seasoning.
meanings.sent1: She carefully placed a sprig of parsley on the plate as a garnish.
meanings.sent2: The parsley added a pop of color to the otherwise plain dish.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the parsley garnish and ran off with it.
meanings.sent4: His words were like parsley, enhancing the flavor of the story he told.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of parsley filled the kitchen, making my mouth water in anticipation.
